topic.title: Applications
topic.shortdesc: An application is a computer software package that performs a specific function directly for an end user. An application can be self-contained or a group of programs. The program is a set of operations that runs the application for the user.

body.p: Application examples: Word processors, Database programs, Web browsers, Deployment tools, Image editors, Communication platforms. Applications use the computer's operating system (OS) and other supporting programs, typically system software, to function. An application requests services from and communicates with other technologies via an application programming interface (API).
